prompts.input: School starts at 8:00 in the morning. If it takes you 30 minutes to get ready and 15 minutes to walk to school, what time should you wake up? Explain how you figured it out.
hints: Add up all the time you need

prompts.input: You have 3 quarters and 2 dimes. A pencil costs 75 cents. Do you have enough money to buy the pencil? How much money do you have in total? Show your thinking.
hints: How much is one quarter worth?
How much is one dime worth?
